isv.sap.payment.option.facade

Class DefaultPaymentOptionFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • isv.sap.payment.option.facade.DefaultPaymentOptionFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PaymentOptionFacade

    public class DefaultPaymentOptionFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements PaymentOptionFacade
    Encapsulates the default implementation of PaymentOptionFacade interface.

    This implementation is based on locally-stored alternative payment options.
